wn_scrol.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**************************************************************************
00002 $Header: wn_scrol.c Sun 11-19-2000 10:50:29 pm HvA V1.00 $
00003 
00004 ***************************************************************************/
00005 
00006 #include "video/v_video.h"
00007 #include "window.h"
00008 
00009 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00010     FUNCTION: wn_scroll()
00011      PURPOSE: Scroll a window up or down
00012       SYNTAX: int wn_scroll(WINDOW *w, int i);
00013               WINDOW *w : pointer to WCB of window to scroll
00014               int i     : number of lines to scroll.
00015                           i > 0 --> scroll up i lines
00016                           i < 0 --> scroll down i lines
00017  DESCRIPTION: Routines taken from C-Chest (CURSES) from Allen Holub, pp 360.
00018               The window to scroll will alway become the active window
00019      RETURNS: Status of window's scroll-ok flag or:
00020               NO_WINDOW if no window opened
00021      HISTORY: 910801 V0.1 - Initial version
00022 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00023 int wn_scroll(WINDOW *w, int i)
00024 {
00025   char *ptr;
00026   int  xsize;
00027   int  ysize;
00028 
00029   wn_log("wn_scroll(window=%p,%s,lines=%1d)\n",w,w->title,i);
00030 
00031   /*---------------------------------------
00032     Check if scrolling has to be performed
00033   ---------------------------------------*/
00034   if (i == 0)
00035     return(-1);
00036 
00037   /*------------------------
00038     Check if window opened
00039   --------------------------*/
00040   if (!w)
00041     return(NO_WINDOW);
00042 
00043   /*---------------------------------------
00044     Check if scrolling is OK
00045   ---------------------------------------*/
00046   if (!w->scroll_ok)
00047     return(-2);
00048 
00049   /*-------------------------------------------------------------
00050     Check if this is the active (top) window. If not, make it so
00051   --------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052   if (w != top_window)
00053     wn_top(w);
00054 
00055   xsize = w->x2 - w->x1 + 1;
00056   ysize = w->y2 - w->y1 + 1;
00057 
00058   /*-------------------------------------------------------------
00059     Allocate enough memory for saving the contents of the window
00060   ---------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061   ptr = (char *) calloc(xsize*ysize*2,1);
00062   if (!ptr)
00063   {
00064     fprintf(stderr,"Not enough memory to save window\n");
00065     return(-3);
00066   }
00067 
00068   if (i > 0) {
00069     /*---------------------------------------
00070       SCROLL UP:
00071       Copy the part of the window to scroll
00072       Past the part in the window
00073       Clear the remainder
00074     ---------------------------------------*/
00075     v_gettext(w->x1,w->y1+i,w->x2 ,w->y2,  ptr);
00076     v_puttext(w->x1,w->y1,  w->x2 ,w->y2-i,ptr);
00077     wn_fill(w,ysize-1,0,xsize,1,' ',w->wcolor);
00078  }
00079 
00080   if ( i < 0) {
00081     /*---------------------------------------
00082       SCROLL DOWN:
00083       Copy the part of the window to scroll
00084       Past the part in the window
00085       Clear the remainder
00086     ---------------------------------------*/
00087     v_gettext(w->x1,w->y1,  w->x2, w->y2+i,ptr);  /* i is negative !!! */
00088     v_puttext(w->x1,w->y1-i,w->x2, w->y2  ,ptr);
00089     wn_fill(w,0,0,xsize,1,' ',w->wcolor);
00090   }
00091 
00092   free(ptr);
00093 
00094   /*--------------------------------
00095     Return status of scroll_ok flag
00096   ----------------------------------*/
00097   return(w->scroll_ok);
00098 }
